title: P01 Gate Result Schema
description: Schema defining the necessary structure for validation results derived from Governance Gate P01 checks, referencing the lawset in G0_Rules.js.

gateID.description: Identifier corresponding to the specific Governance Gate (P01).

status.description: Result state of the governance check.

timestamp.description: Time when the gate evaluation occurred.

artifactReference.description: Hash, path, or identifier of the artifact tested against the gate.

violations.description: List of specific rules or sections of G0_Rules.js violated, if status is NON_COMPLIANT.

metadata.description: Auxiliary data related to the execution context.
